title: Sampler, October 7, 1681
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, satin, back, double running, cross, montenegrin, four-sided, and overcasting stitches, with two bands of withdrawn element work with needlemade fillings, looping, wrap
description: Bands of pattern in polychrome, white and withdrawn element work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, October 7, 1681.
October 7, 1681. Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, satin, back, double running, cross, montenegrin, four-sided, and overcasting stitches, with two bands of withdrawn element work with needlemade fillings, looping, wrap. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-90.
